d‚ÇÇ : (i‚ÇÅ : I‚ÇÅ) ‚Üí (i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' : I‚ÇÇ) ‚Üí Quiver.Hom (X { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ }) (X { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ' })
shape‚ÇÇ : ‚àÄ (i‚ÇÅ : I‚ÇÅ) (i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' : I‚ÇÇ), Not (c‚ÇÇ.Rel i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ') ‚Üí Eq (d‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ') 0

‚ä¢ Eq (((HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ.ofGradedObject c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ X d‚ÇÅ d‚ÇÇ shape‚ÇÇ).X i‚ÇÅ).X i‚ÇÇ) (X { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ })
decl:
/-- Constructor for bicomplexes taking as inputs a graded object, horizontal differentials
and vertical differentials satisfying suitable relations. -/
@[simps]
def ofGradedObject :
    HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ where
  X i‚ÇÅ :=
    { X := fun i‚ÇÇ => X ‚ü®i‚ÇÅ, i‚ÇÇ‚ü©
      d := fun i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' => d‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ'
      shape := shape‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÅ
      d_comp_d' := by intros; apply d‚ÇÇ_comp_d‚ÇÇ }
  d i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' :=
    { f := fun i‚ÇÇ => d‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' i‚ÇÇ
      comm' := by intros; apply comm }
  shape i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' h := by
    ext i‚ÇÇ
    exact shape‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' h i‚ÇÇ
  d_comp_d' i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' i‚ÇÅ'' _ _ := by ext i‚ÇÇ; apply d‚ÇÅ_comp_d‚ÇÅ

name: HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ.homMk_f_f
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_1} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
I‚ÇÅ : Type u_2
I‚ÇÇ : Type u_3
c‚ÇÅ : ComplexShape I‚ÇÅ
c‚ÇÇ : ComplexShape I‚ÇÇ
K L : HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ
f : Quiver.Hom K.toGradedObject L.toGradedObject
comm‚ÇÅ : ‚àÄ (i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' : I‚ÇÅ) (i‚ÇÇ : I‚ÇÇ), c‚ÇÅ.Rel i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' ‚Üí Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (f { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ }) ((L.d i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ').f i‚ÇÇ)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((K.d i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ').f i‚ÇÇ) (f { fst := i‚ÇÅ', snd := i‚ÇÇ }))
comm‚ÇÇ : ‚àÄ (i‚ÇÅ : I‚ÇÅ) (i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' : I‚ÇÇ), c‚ÇÇ.Rel i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' ‚Üí Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (f { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ }) ((L.X i‚ÇÅ).d i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ')) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((K.X i‚ÇÅ).d i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ') (f { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ' }))
i‚ÇÅ : I‚ÇÅ
i‚ÇÇ : I‚ÇÇ
‚ä¢ Eq (((HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ.homMk f comm‚ÇÅ comm‚ÇÇ).f i‚ÇÅ).f i‚ÇÇ) (f { fst := i‚ÇÅ, snd := i‚ÇÇ })
decl:
/-- Constructor for a morphism `K ‚ü∂ L` in the category `HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ` which
takes as inputs a morphism `f : K.toGradedObject ‚ü∂ L.toGradedObject` and
the compatibilites with both horizontal and vertical differentials. -/
@[simps!]
def homMk {K L : HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ}
    (f : K.toGradedObject ‚ü∂ L.toGradedObject)
    (comm‚ÇÅ : ‚àÄ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' i‚ÇÇ, c‚ÇÅ.Rel i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' ‚Üí
      f ‚ü®i‚ÇÅ, i‚ÇÇ‚ü© ‚â´ (L.d i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ').f i‚ÇÇ = (K.d i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ').f i‚ÇÇ ‚â´ f ‚ü®i‚ÇÅ', i‚ÇÇ‚ü©)
    (comm‚ÇÇ : ‚àÄ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ', c‚ÇÇ.Rel i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' ‚Üí
      f ‚ü®i‚ÇÅ, i‚ÇÇ‚ü© ‚â´ (L.X i‚ÇÅ).d i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' = (K.X i‚ÇÅ).d i‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÇ' ‚â´ f ‚ü®i‚ÇÅ, i‚ÇÇ'‚ü©) : K ‚ü∂ L where
  f i‚ÇÅ :=
    { f := fun i‚ÇÇ => f ‚ü®i‚ÇÅ, i‚ÇÇ‚ü©
      comm' := comm‚ÇÇ i‚ÇÅ }
  comm' i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' h‚ÇÅ := by
    ext i‚ÇÇ
    exact comm‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ i‚ÇÅ' i‚ÇÇ h‚ÇÅ

name: HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ.flip_X_d
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_1} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
I‚ÇÅ : Type u_2
I‚ÇÇ : Type u_3
c‚ÇÅ : ComplexShape I‚ÇÅ
c‚ÇÇ : ComplexShape I‚ÇÇ
K : HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ
i : I‚ÇÇ
j j' : I‚ÇÅ
‚ä¢ Eq ((K.flip.X i).d j j') ((K.d j j').f i)
decl:
/-- Flip a complex of complexes over the diagonal,
exchanging the horizontal and vertical directions.
-/
@[simps]
def flip (K : HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÅ c‚ÇÇ) : HomologicalComplex‚ÇÇ C c‚ÇÇ c‚ÇÅ where
  X i :=
    { X := fun j => (K.X j).X i
      d := fun j j' => (K.d j j').f i
      shape := fun _ _ w => K.shape_f _ _ w i }
  d i i' := { f := fun j => (K.X j).d i i' }
  shape i i' w := by
    ext j
    exact (K.X j).shape i i' w
